data.message: I have a question how come someone can take/steal pictures of my kids and post them but when I try to report them to take it down there is no option for that? Please I know I can block, unfollow, unfriend or message someone about the issue, the first three don't solve the issue of the picture being there. I've sent messages with no reply, comment on the picture was taken down(my bfs comment not the picture) please let me know how this can be fixed. I don't like my kids photos shared around especially without my permission😞 thank you.

replies.message: Hey, Leslie. If someone is downloading your photos, altering them, and re-posting them on Facebook, please let us know and we will take them down. Follow these steps to report the photo: http://bit.ly/2hIdUac. -Rhea
